name: Multiplicative.canonicallyOrderedMul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : AddMonoid α
inst✝¹ : PartialOrder α
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedAdd α
⊢ CanonicallyOrderedMul (Multiplicative α)
decl:
instance Multiplicative.canonicallyOrderedMul
    [AddMonoid α] [PartialOrder α] [CanonicallyOrderedAdd α] :
    CanonicallyOrderedMul (Multiplicative α) where
  le_self_mul _ _ := le_self_add (α := α)

name: Additive.canonicallyOrderedAdd
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : Monoid α
inst✝¹ : PartialOrder α
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedMul α
⊢ CanonicallyOrderedAdd (Additive α)
decl:
instance Additive.canonicallyOrderedAdd
    [Monoid α] [PartialOrder α] [CanonicallyOrderedMul α] :
    CanonicallyOrderedAdd (Additive α) where
  le_self_add _ _ := le_self_mul (α := α)
